WorkItem.ClosedComment: Should be fixed for next release. As a workaround you can disable maintain scorch option.
WorkItem.Description:
If I choose "Slot: Talents" in Rawr.Mage (latest version of Rawr v 2.3.12), I get an error popup and an option to continue or quit. Apologies if I'm not reporting this properly.
 
Screenshot: http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v350/holly_the_berry/Image1-2.jpg
 
In the "details" section:
 
See the end of this message for details on invoking 
just-in-time (JIT) debugging instead of this dialog box.
 
************** Exception Text **************
System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object.
